p: The firmness values of each pod were determined at three different points by using the digital penetrometer (PCE-PTR 200, PCE Americas Inc., Jupiter, FL, USA) with 6 mm diameter probe (range 0 to 1 kg*) [ 26]. The firmness values were expressed in Newton (N). To determine total soluble solids (TSS), a digital refractometer (model PR101, Atago [0â€“45%] Co.
